name: Pig Eat Ball
description: Pig Eat Ball is a top-down, action-adventure about eating, getting fat, and barfing on things to solve levels. Explore 20 giant space stations to find different Disguises, and using their Pros and Cons, fight and solve your way through over 200 action-puzzle levels using new, arcade-style mechanics.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, Windows 7, Win 8+ Processor: 1GHz processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphic card with at least 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Should work reasonably well on machines released in the last 5 years. More RAM wouldn't hurt.
